title: Latest: Largest colleges offer mix of vaccine requirements
content:
1. Latest: Largest colleges offer mix of vaccine requirements  Associated Press
  2. Few people medically exempt from getting COVID-19 vaccine: Experts  Yahoo! Voices
  3. In her obituary, a family says a mother's Covid-19 death could have been prevented if more people were vaccinated  CNN
  4. Unvaccinated People Are Banned From This as of Oct. 1, Homeland Security Says  Best Life
  5. US reaches grim milestone as 1 in 500 residents have died of COVID-19  WESH Orlando
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
